00028 #ifndef _RenderOperation_H__
00029 #define _RenderOperation_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreVertexIndexData.h"
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 
00036 
00044     class _OgrePrivate RenderOperation {
00045     public:
00047         enum OperationType {
00049             OT_POINT_LIST = 1,
00051             OT_LINE_LIST = 2,
00053             OT_LINE_STRIP = 3,
00055             OT_TRIANGLE_LIST = 4,
00057             OT_TRIANGLE_STRIP = 5,
00059             OT_TRIANGLE_FAN = 6
00060         };
00061 
00063         VertexData *vertexData;
00064 
00066         OperationType operationType;
00067 
00072         bool useIndexes;
00073 
00075         IndexData *indexData;
00077         const Renderable* srcRenderable;
00078 
00079 
00080 
00081         RenderOperation() :
00082             vertexData(0), operationType(OT_TRIANGLE_LIST), useIndexes(true),
00083                 indexData(0), srcRenderable(0) {}
00084 
00085 
00086     };
00089 }
